data.prayer: Father, help 79 new simple churches start among the 398,200 people in the state of Imbabura, Ecuador. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Imbabura, Ecuador
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Imbabura to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 9 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Imbabura.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Imbabura to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Jew, Spanish-speaking people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Jew, Spanish-speaking people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Jew, Spanish-speaking people is yours.
Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 398,200 souls in Imbabura and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Imbabura, Ecuador.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Imbabura, Ecuador has a population of 398,200.

We estimate Imbabura has 42,097 people who might know Jesus, 330,995 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 25,109 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 42,097 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

location.name: Imbabura
location.people_groups_list: Shuar, Secoya, Taromenane, Media Lengua, Tagaeri
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Shuar (70,000), Secoya (500), Taromenane (200), Media Lengua (3,200), Tagaeri (30)
